short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Peak to Peak's Daily Bell Schedule

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to see when periods start and end for any given schedule at Peak to Peak Charter School.  When you open it, it will display the default schedule for that day, but you can change it to see any bell schedule you'd like.  Works for the High School or Middle School.  You can also click the calendar icon to view the Peak to Peak bell schedule calendar for any given month of the current school year.
